fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Kick a player out of your inn at night. They will not be allowed inside your inn in the future.
- Encourage a player to visit your inn tonight, redirecting them to yourself. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will be announced as the Innkeeper at the start of the game.
- Those who visit you at night will enter your inn. Players inside your inn are healed every night, including the night they visit. However, while inside your inn, they cannot use nightly abilities. They can choose to leave your inn at night, losing the Powerful defense at the start of the next day. You will know when someone visits your inn, when someone leaves, and have a list of everyone inside.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have every alive player have visited your inn at least once.
